import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './features24.css' const Features24 = (props) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0) return (
{activeTab === 0 && ( )} {activeTab === 1 && ( )} {activeTab === 2 && ( )}
setActiveTab(0)} className="features24-tab-horizontal1" >
{activeTab === 0 &&
}

{props.feature1Title ?? ( Terrenos disponibles en Chancay )}

{props.feature1Description ?? ( Amplia variedad de terrenos para elegir )}
setActiveTab(1)} className="features24-tab-horizontal2" >
{activeTab === 1 &&
}

{props.feature2Title ?? ( Acceso a infraestructura moderna )}

{props.feature2Description ?? ( Ubicación estratégica cerca del Megapuerto )}
setActiveTab(2)} className="features24-tab-horizontal3" >
{activeTab === 2 &&
}

{props.feature3Title ?? ( Inversión segura )}

{props.feature3Description ?? ( Oportunidad de inversión en crecimiento )}
) } Features24.defaultProps = { feature2Description: undefined, feature2Title: undefined, feature3ImgAlt: 'Crecimiento de la zona', feature1ImgSrc: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552250575-e508473b090f?ixid=M3w5MTMyMXwwfDF8c2VhcmNofDE1Mnx8YWJzdHJhY3R8ZW58MHx8fHwxNzE2MjAxNjAyfDA&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&w=1400', feature3Description: undefined, feature1ImgAlt: 'Imagen de terreno en Chancay', feature2ImgAlt: 'Ubicación cerca del Megapuerto', feature1Title: undefined, feature3ImgSrc: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618172193622-ae2d025f4032?ixid=M3w5MTMyMXwwfDF8c2VhcmNofDg0fHxhYnN0cmFjdHxlbnwwfHx8fDE3MTYyMDE1NTZ8MA&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&w=1400', feature3Title: undefined, feature2ImgSrc: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1505356822725-08ad25f3ffe4?ixid=M3w5MTMyMXwwfDF8c2VhcmNofDQ3fHxhYnN0cmFjdHxlbnwwfHx8fDE3MTYyMDEzMDd8MA&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&w=1400', feature1Description: undefined, } Features24.propTypes = { feature2Description: PropTypes.element, feature2Title: PropTypes.element, feature3ImgAlt: PropTypes.string, feature1ImgSrc: PropTypes.string, feature3Description: PropTypes.element, feature1ImgAlt: PropTypes.string, feature2ImgAlt: PropTypes.string, feature1Title: PropTypes.element, feature3ImgSrc: PropTypes.string, feature3Title: PropTypes.element, feature2ImgSrc: PropTypes.string, feature1Description: PropTypes.element, } export default Features24
